staxel.village.dialogue.MayorGiveItem.li: ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! Is that for the town treasury?
If more people were as generous as you we'd be in much better shape!
Ah yes, this will certainly help!
I think this might be better given to someone else...
It won't contribute much to the town.
Sorry, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;, my duties as mayor come first!
Oh, would you look at that!
You want me to move in to your farm?
Do you think perhaps I should bring some of my furniture with me?
I haven't been out to your farm in quite some time...
If I was in your shoes, I would certainly prefer the mayoral home!
